description: Mold on Pizza is a mold-growing game to fight against the Preservative troops and conquer a pizza! Meet up 53 types of unique molds and preservatives!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.4 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 Ghz dual-core Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very good game yes yes lots of mold yes yes yayyyyyyyyy.
